mapper.select: select * from (select rownum r, c.* from (select * from campaign order by campaign_num asc) c) where r between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
select last_number from user_sequences where sequence_name=upper('campaign_seq')
mapper.update: update campaign set id=#{id}, campaign_title=#{campaign_title}, goal_price=#{goal_price}, period=#{period}, campaign_end=#{campaign_end}, campaign_img=#{campaign_img}, simple_story=#{simple_story}, story=#{story}, main_video=#{main_video}, option_msg=#{option_msg}, bank=#{bank}, bank_account=#{bank_account}, register_name=#{register_name}, register_phone=#{register_phone}, register_email=#{register_email}, permission='unapproved', campaign_start=sysdate, thumbs_up=0, support_price=0, support_hit=0 where campaign_num=#{campaign_num}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum r, c.* from (select * from campaign where permission='approved' order by campaign_start desc) c) where r between 1 and 3
select * from (select rownum r, c.* from (select * from campaign where permission='approved' order by thumbs_up desc) c) where r between 1 and 4
select * from (select rownum r, c.* from (select * from campaign where permission='approved' order by thumbs_up desc) c) where r between 5 and 8
